cast.name: 让-皮埃尔·利奥德 Jean-Pierre Léaud
克劳德·德吉弗雷 Claude de Givray

this_title: "Cinéastes de notre temps" François Truffaut ou L'esprit critique
introduction: In this 1965 documentary, François Truffaut, shown at home and in the screening room, comments on his films from Les Mistons to La Peau Douce, thus revealing the connection between his opinions as critic and his work as filmmaker. He speaks candidly about his past as movie buff, his collaboration with the Cahiers du Cinéma, those who have influenced him, and his admiration for American cinema.
chinese_title: "Cinéastes de notre temps" François Truffaut ou L'esprit critique
